overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a presence on Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total following of 3580. His content focuses on research, particularly in the areas of disinformation, information operations, and computational social science. Engagement varies across platforms, with LinkedIn showing the highest engagement based on available metrics.

contentThemes.description: Sharing updates on research projects, publications, and grants.
Discussing methodological approaches and computational methods for social media analysis.
Addressing coordinated inauthentic behavior, disinformation campaigns, and information operations.
Announcing job openings and research opportunities within the team.

recommendations: Cross-promote content across platforms to maximize reach and engagement.
Engage more actively with comments and replies to foster a sense of community.
Use platform-specific features to tailor content to each audience (e.g., LinkedIn articles, Mastodon threads, Bluesky short-form posts).
Experiment with different content formats (e.g., videos, infographics, polls) to see what resonates best with each audience.

platformInsights.bluesky: Bluesky shows good engagement through reposts, suggesting the content resonates with the community. Focus on short, impactful updates and questions to drive interaction.
platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon engagement is more modest. Consider increasing the frequency of posts and experimenting with different content types to see what performs best within the AOIR.social instance.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn shows the highest engagement, particularly on posts related to research grants and job opportunities. Continue posting professional updates and career-related content to maintain engagement.
